member.name: T:Serilog.FileLoggerConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extends with methods to add file sinks.

member.name: M:Serilog.FileLoggerConfigurationExtensions.File(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,System.String,Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Nullable{System.Int64},Serilog.Core.LoggingLevelSwitch,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Write log events to the specified file.
member.param: Logger sink configuration.
Path to the file.
The minimum level for events passed through the sink. Ignored when is specified.
A switch allowing the pass-through minimum level to be changed at runtime.
Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.
A message template describing the format used to write to the sink. the default is "{Timestamp} [{Level}] {Message}{NewLine}{Exception}".

The approximate maximum size, in bytes, to which a log file will be allowed to grow. For unrestricted growth, pass null. The default is 1 GB. To avoid writing partial events, the last event within the limit will be written in full even if it exceeds the limit.
Indicates if flushing to the output file can be buffered or not. The default is false.
Allow the log file to be shared by multiple processes. The default is false.
If provided, a full disk flush will be performed periodically at the specified interval.
member.remarks: The file will be written using the UTF-8 character set.

member.name: M:Serilog.FileLoggerConfigurationExtensions.File(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,Serilog.Formatting.ITextFormatter,System.String,Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,System.Nullable{System.Int64},Serilog.Core.LoggingLevelSwitch,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Write log events to the specified file.
member.param: Logger sink configuration.
A formatter, such as , to convert the log events into text for the file. If control of regular text formatting is required, use the other overload of and specify the outputTemplate parameter instead.
Path to the file.
The minimum level for events passed through the sink. Ignored when is specified.
A switch allowing the pass-through minimum level to be changed at runtime.

The approximate maximum size, in bytes, to which a log file will be allowed to grow. For unrestricted growth, pass null. The default is 1 GB. To avoid writing partial events, the last event within the limit will be written in full even if it exceeds the limit.
Indicates if flushing to the output file can be buffered or not. The default is false.
Allow the log file to be shared by multiple processes. The default is false.
If provided, a full disk flush will be performed periodically at the specified interval.
member.remarks: The file will be written using the UTF-8 character set.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.File.FileSink
member.summary: Write log events to a disk file.

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.File.FileSink.#ctor(System.String,Serilog.Formatting.ITextFormatter,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.param: Path to the file.
Formatter used to convert log events to text.

The approximate maximum size, in bytes, to which a log file will be allowed to grow. For unrestricted growth, pass null. The default is 1 GB. To avoid writing partial events, the last event within the limit will be written in full even if it exceeds the limit.
Character encoding used to write the text file. The default is UTF-8 without BOM.
Indicates if flushing to the output file can be buffered or not. The default is false.
member.remarks: The file will be written using the UTF-8 character set.

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.File.FileSink.Emit(Serilog.Events.LogEvent)
member.summary: Emit the provided log event to the sink.
member.param: The log event to write.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.File.IFlushableFileSink
member.summary: Supported by (file-based) sinks that can be explicitly flushed.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.File.NullSink
member.summary: An instance of this sink may be substituted when an instance of the is unable to be constructed.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.File.PeriodicFlushToDiskSink
member.summary: A sink wrapper that periodically flushes the wrapped sink to disk.

member.name: M:Serilog.Sinks.File.PeriodicFlushToDiskSink.#ctor(Serilog.Core.ILogEventSink,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Construct a that wraps and flushes it at the specified .
member.param: The sink to wrap.
The interval at which to flush the underlying sink.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.File.SharedFileSink
member.summary: Write log events to a disk file.

member.param: Path to the file.
Formatter used to convert log events to text.

The approximate maximum size, in bytes, to which a log file will be allowed to grow. For unrestricted growth, pass null. The default is 1 GB. To avoid writing partial events, the last event within the limit will be written in full even if it exceeds the limit.
Character encoding used to write the text file. The default is UTF-8 without BOM.
member.remarks: The file will be written using the UTF-8 character set.
